column5: As the title suggests I am heading to the Riviera Nayarit on Friday and I was wondering if it would be worthwhile to bring a fishing rod with me? I imagine I would be mostly fishing from the beach.
I guess no one has any info. I'll do google search.
There is a reef along most of the coast of Mexico and you aren't allowed to fish between the reef and shore. Perhaps the reef doesn't extend to your area?
Don't know. I'll have to look into that.
